com.artemis

Interface ArtemisPlugin


  • public interface ArtemisPlugin
    Plugin for artemis-odb.
    Author:
    Daan van Yperen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setup(WorldConfigurationBuilder b)
      Register your plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(WorldConfigurationBuilder b)
        Register your plugin. Set up all your dependencies here. - systems - field resolvers - other plugins Always prefer to use WorldConfigurationBuilder.dependsOn(java.lang.Class...) as it can handle repeated dependencies, as opposed to WorldConfigurationBuilder.with(int, com.artemis.BaseSystem...), which will throw an exception upon attempting to add a pre-existing class.
        Parameters:
        b - builder to register your dependencies with.
